author: Tess Owen, Anne Torpey
title: This Brooklyn Guy Was Arrested for Allegedly Stockpiling Medical Supplies and Selling Them on WhatsApp
description: He allegedly intentionally coughed on the arresting FBI agents and told them he had COVID-19.
content:
A Brooklyn man is facing federal charges for allegedly stockpiling enough medical supplies to outfit an entire hospital and peddling them at inflated prices to doctors and nurses through a WhatsApp group labeled Virus2020!
Baruch Feldheim, 43, was interviewe… [+3810 chars]
